markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[True Shapeshifter](/Feats.aspx?ID=355) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=340); [Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

You transcend the limitations of form. While under the effects of [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481), you can change into any other form on your _wild shape_ list; if the durations of the forms would vary, use the shorter of the two durations.

 Once per day, you can transform into a kaiju, with the effects of [_nature incarnate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=204); if you have [Plant Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=338), you can instead transform into a green man.
name: True Shapeshifter

summary_markdown: You transcend the limitations of form.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 20" pfs="Standard" > True Shapeshifter Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 139 4.0 Prerequisites Dragon Shape; Wild Shape --- You transcend the limitations of form. While under the effects of wild shape , you can change into any other form on your wild shape list; if the durations of the forms would vary, use the shorter of the two durations. Once per day, you can transform into a kaiju, with the effects of nature incarnate ; if you have Plant Shape, you can instead transform into a green man.
